content.question: Do you need your contact details kept private from your {{ divorceWho }}?
content.divorcePetitionCopy: A copy of your divorce petition will be sent to your {{ divorceWho }}.
content.court: The court won't include your address, email or phone number if you want them to be kept confidential.
content.share: I don't need my contact details kept private

checkYourAnswersContent.question: How your contact details can be shared

petitionerContactDetailsConfidential.required: Select 'Keep my contact details private' if you want your address, email and phone number kept confidential
petitionerContactDetailsConfidential.invalid: Select 'Keep my contact details private' if you want your address, email and phone number kept confidential
